subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shaun Marcum’s inglorious 0-9 run in his first year with the Mets came to an end Wednesday, when he produced eight masterly innings to lead the Mets to a win over the Chicago White Sox.
snippet: Shaun Marcum’s inglorious 0-9 run in his first year with the Mets came to an end Wednesday, when he produced eight masterly innings to lead the Mets to a win over the Chicago White Sox.
